modShortDescription: This tool makes it possible to dig and harvest very large amounts of land/wood very quickly and also works very well as a melee weapon.
modDescription:
Previously Victorious had create a 7 Days to Die mod that adds a high powered pick called “Super Pick”. It is only available through a trader for a relatively high price with a huge benefit of not degrading or breaking.

This [tool](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) makes it possible to dig and harvest very large amounts of land/wood very quickly and also works very well as a [melee weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-melee-weapons/).

He has recreated and attached this using the new mod approach.

[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1VU1bfwdIrGI6zSx1hIF0fprfTHzAqOk5) for A17  
[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=13ruKU5Y4D_YvvTZg0TBZId8HJKeYAq2D) for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/11943-superpick-digger-tool-mod/).

**Credits:** Victorious
